content.rendered:
UPC code(s) for Amazon, eBay, etc. These are 12-digits.

You can find full pricing options here:

2022 UPCs.com UPC Code Pricing
Quantity Price Buy
1 UPC Code $5 ($5 Each) Buy Now
5 UPC Codes $10 ($2 Each) Buy Now
10 UPC Codes $15 ($1.5 Each) Buy Now
25 UPC Codes $25 ($1 Each) Buy Now
50 UPC Codes $35 ($0.70 Each) Buy Now
100 UPC Codes $45 ($0.45 Each) Buy Now
250 UPC Codes $87.50 ($0.35 Each) Buy Now
300 UPC Codes $105 ($0.35 Each) Buy Now
400 UPC Codes $120 ($0.30 Each) Buy Now
500 UPC Codes $125 ($0.25 Each) Buy Now
750 UPC Codes $150 ($0.20 Each) Buy Now
1000 UPC Codes $180 ($0.18 Each) Buy Now
2000 UPC Codes $300 ($0.15 Each) Buy Now
3000 UPC Codes $390 ($0.13 Each) Buy Now
5000 UPC Codes $500 ($0.10 Each) Buy Now
5000+ UPC Codes Contact Us Contact Us

You can find the SnapUPC.com pricing above.  You can buy 1, or 1,000+ – we can supply as many as you need.  We strive to offer the cheapest price, so if you know of cheaper, let us know and we’ll beat it.

Every order is delivered instantly upon payment and can be used immediately!
